keyStories.headline: Fed held rates at 5.25–5.50%; dot plot shifted hawkish
keyStories.whyItMatters: Markets now pricing only 2 cuts in 2026, down from 4. Treasury yields spiked, equities sold off.

keyStories.headline: CPI printed 3.4% YoY, above 3.2% consensus
keyStories.whyItMatters: Core inflation remains sticky. Reinforces Fed's cautious stance. Dollar strengthened on the print.

keyStories.headline: CBRT emergency meeting scheduled for Thursday
keyStories.whyItMatters: USD/TRY volatility expected. Speculation of 500bp hike to defend lira amid capital outflows.

keyStories.headline: China PBoC signals potential RRR cut this week
keyStories.whyItMatters: Easing measures to support slowing economy. Positive for risk assets and commodities if confirmed.

keyStories.headline: Oil spikes 3% on Red Sea shipping disruptions
keyStories.whyItMatters: Supply route concerns pushing Brent above $82. Watch for inflation passthrough if sustained.

keyStories.headline: German IFO business climate misses expectations
keyStories.whyItMatters: Eurozone's largest economy continues to struggle. EUR weakness likely; ECB cut bets rising.

keyStories.headline: US 10Y-2Y spread widens to 45bps
keyStories.whyItMatters: Curve steepening continues post-Fed. Market positioning for higher-for-longer rates regime.

keyStories.headline: Gold hits 2-week high on geopolitical hedging
keyStories.whyItMatters: Safe-haven flows despite stronger dollar. Watch $2,050 resistance level.

recentDigests.title: Fed Holds, Inflation Sticky, EM Under Pressure
recentDigests.summary: FOMC delivered hawkish hold; CPI surprise pushes back rate cut expectations; Turkey convenes emergency meeting.

recentDigests.title: Pre-FOMC Positioning, China Stimulus Hints
recentDigests.summary: Markets cautious ahead of Fed; PBoC signals potential RRR cut; oil steady on mixed demand signals.

recentDigests.title: Tech Earnings Beat, Yield Curve Steepens
recentDigests.summary: Mega-cap tech delivers; 10Y-2Y spread widens to 40bps; gold hits 2-week high on geopolitical concerns.

recentDigests.title: PMI Weakness Across Europe
recentDigests.summary: Eurozone composite PMI misses; German manufacturing contracts further; EUR/USD tests 1.08 support.
